name: atob
description: Simple app getting you from point A to B

scripts.cordova:platform:android: cd dist/cordova && cordova platform add android@4.0.2 --save
scripts.cordova:move: cp dist/browser/index.html dist/cordova/www/. && cp dist/browser/js/bundle.js dist/cordova/www/js/.
scripts.cordova:plugins: cd dist/cordova && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-geolocation && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-device-orientation && cordova plugin add https://github.com/EddyVerbruggen/Insomnia-PhoneGap-Plugin.git && cordova prepare
scripts.cordova: npm run build && npm run cordova:create && npm run cordova:platform:android && npm run cordova:config && npm run cordova:plugins && npm run cordova:move && npm run cordova:build
